name: Day Lineup
description: Prepare yourself, prepare your day, prepare your life! But, take it day-by-day..

browser_action.default_title: Prepare yourself, prepare your day, prepare your life! Sick of assignments and due dates creeping up on you? Fix that with an all-in-one chrome app which has simplicty at the core of it's use-case.

content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://ssl.google-analytics.com; script-src 'self' https://www.google.com; script-src 'self' https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.4.1.min.js; object-src 'self'
